Description: With this tender, the municipality of Richterswil is granting concessions for the implementation and operation of public charging stations in municipal parking spaces. The community wants to offer an attractive and needs-based charging network in its area.<br> For those already predefined At locations no. 1-3 (see document D description and specifications of the locations), the municipality is implementing the basic infrastructure and network development (expansion level C2 according to SIA 2060). The installation of the charging infrastructure (expansion level D according to SIA 2060) as well as the entire operation is carried out by the Concessionaires taken over. At location no. 4, both the installation of the basic infrastructure and the charging stations are carried out by the concessionaire.<br> For the occupancy of public parking spaces and the use of the basic infrastructure financed by the municipality For network development, those offering the community pay a concession fee in the form of an annual site rental.<br> The detailed catalog of requirements can be found in documents B Requirements specification, C Offer form and D Description and specifications of the locations.<br> Realization and Operation of public charging infrastructure<br> With this tender, the municipality of Richterswil grants concessions for the realization and the operation of public charging stations in municipal parking lots. input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: BKW ENERGIE AG - PROCUREMENT SERVICES. Summary: New it Solution for Customer-Centric Billing and Service Processes Energy & Networks. Description: This public tender will procure an integrated software solution for the energy industry. This will include contract management and measurement-based billing of energy and network services as well as the digitalization and automation of customer processes (Customer Relationship Management).<br> Lot 1 covers the areas of commercial contract management, customer service, network connection management, marketing as well as the comprehensive control and orchestration of customer and partner-related processes.<br> Contract management and billing for measurement based Tariffs<br> Lot 2 covers the areas of operational contract management as well as the billing of measured value-based energy and network services for consumers and producers.<br> Doc Title: New IT solution for customer-centric billing and service processes Energy & Networks<br> Contract type: services. Published Date: 2025-11-07. Closing Date: 2026-01-19. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: ENERGY WATER BERN. Summary: Ebp-555_Procurement of Vehicles. Description: This tender will be used to procure commercial vehicles and passenger vehicles (cars) in various categories. The procurement item also includes services such as vehicle registration, short training upon handover, etc Maintenance for at least 5 years (service package), replacement vehicles as needed and a warranty period of at least 5 years. The vehicles to be procured will be primarily for urban use (stop and go) and for commuting to work during on-call operations used. The vehicles are purchased from ewb (not leased) and should have a useful life of at least five (5) years. The charging infrastructure for electric vehicles is excluded from this tender. They are advertised in the section 6.6 of the specifications. We are looking for a minimum of one contractual partner (= 1 contractual partner for all 3 lots), or a maximum of three (3) contractual partners (i.e. one contractual partner per lot with all vehicle categories required therein). This means that up to three lots can be offered. Main CPV: 34000000 means of transport and products for transport purposes. Published Date: 2025-11-07. Closing Date: 2025-12-17. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: SBB CFF FFS INFRA-ENERGIE. Summary: Machine Groups Ewag. Description: The Etzelwerk power plant, built between 1932 and 1937, uses the gradient between Lake Sihl and Lake Zurich to generate energy and produces around 10% of Switzerland's traction power requirements. After the license renewal in 2023, the SBB now runs the Renewal and replacement of plant components of the Etzelwerk pumped storage power plant as part of the Etzelwerk power plant renewal project. The subject of this tender is the renewal of the original machine sets 1-3 as well Subsystems of machine groups 4-6. Further services will be tendered as part of options for future renovation work on machine groups 4-7, which are currently planned following the work on machine groups 1-3. More Information about the project can be found in the project description (Document B1). Main CPV: 42100000 machines for the production and use of mechanical energy. Published Date: 2025-11-07. Closing Date: 2026-03-13. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: SBB CFF FFS INFRA-ENERGIE. Summary: Machine Groups Ewag. Description: The Etzelwerk power plant, built between 1932 and 1937, uses the gradient between Lake Sihl and Lake Zurich to generate energy and produces around 10% of Switzerland's traction power requirements. After the license renewal in 2023, SBB is now renewing and replacing parts of the system of the Etzelwerk pumped storage power plant as part of the Etzelwerk power plant renewal project. The subject of this tender is the renewal of the original machine sets 1-3 as well as subsystems of machine groups 4-6. Further services are available as part of options Future renewal work on machine groups 4-7 has been tendered, which is currently planned following the work on machine groups 1-3. Further information about the project can be found in the project description (Document B1).<br> The following lots are part of this tender:<br> - Go 401 Machine groups 1 to 3, comprising the main components motor/generator and turbines of machine groups 1-3 and turbine ball valves of machine groups 1-6 (hereinafter referred to as lot 401)<br> - Lot 402 storage pump MG3, comprising the storage pump of machine group 3 and the pump ball valves Machine groups 3 and 4 (hereinafter referred to as lot 402)<br> The services advertised in this tender include the planning, manufacture, delivery, assembly, commissioning and acceptance testing of the main components and their auxiliary systems and the others advertised K.... Published Date: 2025-11-05. Closing Date: 2026-03-13. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

In the as part of a loan granted by the City of Geneva for the development of loT projects, ENE wants to set up an loT network based mainly on LoRa technology and covering the entire value chain, i.e. sensors, the LoRa network, data processing and visualization collected. ENE already manages some 400 installed sensors today and plans to deploy more than 1,500 as part of this project. A service provider is being sought to set up and manage this future LoT network as well as to promote and present the data collected.<br> The project covers the establishment of a LoT network using LoRa technology for the recording and processing of data generated by sensors deployed in buildings in the territory of the City of Geneva. input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: WINTERTHUR CANTONAL HOSPITAL - SUPPLY CHAIN MANAGEMENT. Summary: Licensing Microsoft. Description: The aim of this tender is to ensure Microsoft licensing in accordance with the licensing strategy redefined in 2025. We are looking for a licensing partner who can reliably, economically and reliably provide the Winterthur Cantonal Hospital with the necessary licenses for the years 2026 to 2028 in the desired configuration. With this tender, the KSW is identifying a licensing partner for the years 2026-2028 (lot 1) and a license supplier for individual licenses for the year 2025 (lot 2)<br> Licensing 2026-2028<br> This lot includes the licenses from the KSW's existing contracts with Microsoft: • Select+ • Enterprise Agreement (EA) • Cloud Solution Provider (CSP) • Server and Cloud Enrollment (SCE)<br> Purchasing individual licenses<br> In order to address the increasing cost pressure in the healthcare system and to keep IT spending as low as possible in the coming years certain Microsoft Office licenses should be procured as verified used licenses. This lot includes the delivery of licenses that are fully compliant and operational from a legal and technical perspective.<br> Doc Title: Licensing Microsoft<br> Contract type: supplies. Published Date: 2025-10-30. Closing Date: 2025-11-24. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: EMPA CENTRAL PURCHASING. Summary: Low-Temperature Scanning Probe Microscope for In-Operando Device Nanoscopy. Description: The subject of this tender is a low-temperature (3k), ultrahigh vacuum (uhv) scanning probe microscopy system with optical access to the scanned sample to pinpoint device structures in the sub-micrometer range to be investigated on the atomic level. the system provides state-of-the-art scanning tunneling microscopy (stm), spectroscopy (sts) and tuning fork based noncontact atomic force microscopy (nc-afm), including uhv preparation chamber and load lock. main cpv: 38514200 scanning probe microscopes. Published Date: 2025-10-24. Closing Date: 2025-11-26. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: SBB CFF FFS INFRA-ENERGIE. Summary: Machine Groups Ewag. Description: The Etzelwerk power plant, built between 1932 and 1937, uses the gradient between Lake Sihl and Lake Zurich to generate energy and produces around 10% of Switzerland's traction power requirements. After the license renewal in 2023, SBB is now renewing and replacing parts of the system of the Etzelwerk pumped storage power plant as part of the Etzelwerk power plant renewal project. The subject of this tender is the renewal of the original machine sets 1-3 as well as subsystems of machine groups 4-6. Further services are available as part of options Future renewal work on machine groups 4-7 has been tendered, which is currently planned following the work on machine groups 1-3. Further information about the project can be found in the project description (Document B1).<br> The following lots are part of this tender:<br> - Go 401 Machine groups 1 to 3, comprising the main components motor/generator and turbines of machine groups 1-3 and turbine ball valves of machine groups 1-6 (hereinafter referred to as lot 401)<br> - Lot 402 storage pump MG3, comprising the storage pump of machine group 3 and the pump ball valves Machine groups 3 and 4 (hereinafter referred to as lot 402)<br> The services advertised in this tender include the planning, manufacture, delivery, assembly, commissioning and acceptance testing of the main components and their auxiliary systems and the others advertised K.... Published Date: 2025-10-23. Closing Date: 2026-03-06. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: SBB CFF FFS INFRA-ENERGIE. Summary: Machine Groups Ewag. Description: The Etzelwerk power plant, built between 1932 and 1937, uses the gradient between Lake Sihl and Lake Zurich to generate energy and produces around 10% of Switzerland's traction power requirements. After the license renewal in 2023, the SBB now runs the Renewal and replacement of plant components of the Etzelwerk pumped storage power plant as part of the Etzelwerk power plant renewal project. The subject of this tender is the renewal of the original machine sets 1-3 as well Subsystems of machine groups 4-6. Further services will be tendered as part of options for future renovation work on machine groups 4-7, which are currently planned following the work on machine groups 1-3. More Information about the project can be found in the project description (Document B1). Main CPV: 42100000 machines for the production and use of mechanical energy. Published Date: 2025-10-22. Closing Date: 2026-03-06. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

Description: The Technical Operations Wil (TBW) is planning a district heating network. This is supplied with waste heat from the waste incineration plant of the Bazenheid Waste Recycling Association (ZAB). The heat is transported to the south of the city of Wil via a 5.2 km long transfer line. From there it is distributed over two main lines: one leads to the west of the city to the St.Gallen Psychiatry, the other to the east via the Lindenhof school complex to Wil Hospital. The first heat delivery in Wil is planned for the 2026/2027 heating season.<br> Main CPV: 48000000 software package and information systems. Published Date: 2025-10-11. Closing Date: 2025-11-25. Summary: N02, According to San Gottardo Tube (1tg Röhre Nord Ud Airolo Gallery) Und N2 First Restore San Gottardo (1tg Röhre Süd) Bsa-los 6005-sos-alarmkasten. Description: In order to enable the renovation of the existing - around 17 km long - Gotthard Strassentunnel, the Federal Council, Parliament and the population decided to build a second tube. The BSA equipment of the second tube, referred to as tube north, takes place from 2027 to 2030, partly in parallel to the completion of the structural work. Immediately after the opening of the tube north in oncoming, the existing tube, which is referred to as tube south. The structural renovation is scheduled for 2030 to 2036. The existing BSA equipment of the tube south is completely dismantled due to its age. This is followed by the structural renovation and the BSA new equipment. In the final state, the GTG is operated at a speed of 80 km/h in the direction of direction (a lane plus breakdown strip per tube). A block of a tube will occur again and again for maintenance and event reasons. <br> Main CPV: 35121000 safety equipment. Published Date: 2025-10-02. Closing Date: 2025-12-11. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

The GU-UL is also responsible for the cable application systems, the fastening material, the bridges, the cable seals, fire shooters and all grounds.<br> • Cable laying With new 15 KV cables for the two ULS 42 & 44 after Melide from the IRS system in the new UW Pian Scairolo to the existing crash portal (including introduction to the IRS, new cable ends, new KEV scaffolding, new overvoltage discounts, isolators & their grounds on the existing A.... input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: SWISSGRID AG. Summary: Software-Asset-Management (Sam). Description: The tender refers to the provision of comprehensive services in the area of ​​software asset management (SAM), which support an effective management of software assets at Swissgrid.<br> In view of the challenges through the transition to cloud -based services and the need to To keep an exact overview of all acquired, rented and used software assets is Swissgrid in search of a SAM service provider who ensures optimal license, compliance security and cost efficiency.<br> The focus is on implementation, the company And the continuous optimization of the SAM processes, supported by a SAM tool that meets the specific requirements of Swissgrid. input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: EPFL-SCIENTIFIC EQUIPMENT. Summary: Measuring Devices for the Characterization of Rf Semiconductor Devices. Description: The EPFL wishes to acquire an active LOAD-Pull measurement system below Terahertz (Sub-Thz), as well as a series of frequency extensors adapted to VNA and VMU measuring units, for the characterization of RF semiconductor devices (3 lots). This system will cover a frequency range going About 75 GHz to 260 GHz for high power measurements, as well as additional low power extensors covering the 220 GHz range at 330 GHz (and beyond), for the powerlab of the Institute of Electric Genius and Microotechnics (IEM).<br> The equipment will be dedicated to the search for Pointe on the power systems in millimeter and sub-Thz waves, as well as on the hyperfrequency monolithic circuits (MMICS). In accordance with the scientific objectives of the PowerLab, the accent will be placed in the following areas:<br> High frequency and high power devices for next generation communication applications;<br> Frequency extensors will be used to characterize RF devices in the range of 75 to 260 GHz, with high power modules suitable for LOAD-Pull measurements. In addition, low -power extensors covering the range of 220 to 330 GHz (and beyond) will be connected to a Keysight PNA system.<br> Active Load-Pull System<br> An active LOAD-Pull measurement system below Terahertz (Sub-Thz) for the characterization of RF semiconductor devices (see specifications).<br> Frequency Extenders - High power<br> THE.... Published Date: 2025-08-11. Closing Date: 2025-09-17. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: UNIVERSITY OF BERN, INSTITUTE FOR TISSUE MEDICINE AND PATHOLOGY (IGMP). Summary: Procurement of a Scanning Environment for Object Carriers. Description: The IGMP requires a scanner environment including suitable software, which digitized 1200 object carriers every day within six hours and supports all object types used in the institute. The output format must be compatible with Halo AP (preferred DICOM) to ensure the connection to the BMS from Indica Labs operated in the AWS cloud and ensure data protection-compliant upload. The slides generated should offer sufficient image quality and resolution both for the digital assessment by the medical profession and for the use of analysis algorithms. Since the scanner operation takes place in the diagnostic environment, CE-IVDR certification is required; In addition, the solution must meet the IT basic protection requirements of the University of Bern, especially with regard to software updates for at least four years (desired system life for ten years). The user interface is said to be intuitive in German so that laboratory staff can carry out simple error loops independently without a technical background. Installation, training and subsequent support must be paid at the location of the IGMP. Finally, D .... Published Date: 2025-08-04. Closing Date: 2025-09-12. Competition: ICB. input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: FEDERAL OFFICE FOR STREET ASTRA DEPARTMENT OF STRASSEN INFRASTRUCTURE -OST -F3 ZOFINGEN. Summary: N02, Secondo Tubo San Gottardo (gtg Röhre Nord and Galleria Di Airolo) and N02, Ep 1tg (gtg Tube South), Bsa-los 3302-flaps Ventilation System. Description: In order to enable the renovation of the existing - around 17 km long - Gotthard Strassentunnel, the Federal Council, Parliament and the population decided to build a second tube. The BSA equipment of the second tube, referred to as tube north, takes place from 2027 to 2030, partly in parallel to the completion of the structural work. Immediately after the opening of the tube north in oncoming, the existing tube, which is referred to as tube south. The structural renovation is scheduled for 2030 to 2036. The existing BSA equipment of the tube south is completely dismantled due to its age. This is followed by the structural renovation and the BSA new equipment. In the final state, the GTG is operated at a speed of 80 km/h in the direction of direction (a lane plus breakdown strip per tube). A block of a tube will occur again and again for maintenance and event reasons. <br> Main CPV: 31720000 electromechanical equipment. Published Date: 2025-08-04. Closing Date: 2025-09-23. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

The machine is required for use in the timber harvest under demanding terrain conditions.<br> It should be built compactly, soil -friendly and versatile be used, in particular tailored to the operational requirements in the public forest and private forest, as well as on changing forms of terrain.<br> The equipment includes, among other things, a gripper saw, clamping bike, pounding basket and a powerful double drum winch.<br> Central surcharge criteria In addition to the price, the ergonomics for the operator, good visibility, flexibility and high occupational safety are in particular.<br> In addition to the offer for the new forest tractor, the providers are asked to offer a separate surrender offer for the existing FORWARDER KOMATSU 845 (year of construction 2016).<br> The detailed technical requirements as well as information on delivery, references, services and evaluation criteria are described in the submission documents.<br> Replacement procurement fortress vehicle forestry company Kaiserstuhl region<br> The subject of this tender is the Delivery of a new forest tractor with a 6-wheel construction as a replacement for an existing forwarder. Description: The Cantonal Police Bern, hereby also mentioned the client, operates around 3,200 smartphones and around 250 tablets, which are managed by a mobile device management. According to their life cycle, these are replaced every three years. With the use of mobile devices, the business processes of the Bern cantonal police are to be optimally supported. input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: ETH ZÜRICH - INFORMATIKDIENSTE. Summary: Verifiable Credentials. Description: ETH Zurich is seeking a solution for issuing and verifying digital credentials based on the Swiss federal government's trust infrastructure. The solution must be adaptable to ETH's needs and suitable for use cases in the field of education. A high degree of international compatibility and flexibility are expected. With this project, ETH aims to replace a large proportion of the certificates currently issued and, in the long term, also qualifications with digital credentials. <br> Doc Title: Verifiable Credentials <br> Contract Type: supplies.
